page.title: 16LOCAL NEWSPAPERS, PRESTON
page.content: There are three local newspapers in the Preston area - The Lancashire Evening Post, The Citizen and The Leader. The Post costs 16p whereas the other two are free. Between June 3rd and June 8th 1985 the following events took place in the Preston area: a row about leadership of Lancashire County Council, a dispute between local publicans over licensing hours and the construction of a new Â£16m shopping centre. There were various galas and festivals and also the Great Northwestern Half Marathon, and a fun- run in which 4,000 sponsored runners raised money for a special cardiac centre. Other events advertised included 3 films at the Preston Odeon, various old time sequence dances, discos and judo and ju-jitsu classes.
